snippet: Mame Biram Diouf's late goal lifted Stoke City to a 2-1 victory over West Ham United in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Diouf Strikes Late to Lift Stoke
headline.print_headline: Diouf Strikes Late to Lift Stoke

lead_paragraph: Mame Biram Diouf's late goal lifted Stoke City to a 2-1 victory over West Ham United in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Benik Afobe scored his first goal for Bournemouth to lift his team to a 3-0 win over relegation rivals Norwich City in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Afobe Strikes as Bournemouth Overpower Norwich
headline.print_headline: Afobe Strikes as Bournemouth Overpower Norwich

lead_paragraph: Benik Afobe scored his first goal for Bournemouth to lift his team to a 3-0 win over relegation rivals Norwich City in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola knows that if he fails to turn around his team's flagging results he could face the sack but the Spaniard is determined to stick with his style of play....

headline.main: If You Don't Win You're in Trouble-Guardiola
headline.print_headline: If You Don't Win You're in Trouble-Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola knows that if he fails to turn around his team's flagging results he could face the sack but the Spaniard is determined to stick with his style of play.

snippet: Chelsea have left the door open for John Terry to stay at Stamford Bridge after the central defender announced that he is leaving when his contract expires at the end of the season....

headline.main: Chelsea Leave Door Open for Terry to Stay
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Leave Door Open for Terry to Stay

lead_paragraph: Chelsea have left the door open for John Terry to stay at Stamford Bridge after the central defender announced that he is leaving when his contract expires at the end of the season.

snippet: Chelsea must not fall victim to another FA Cup giant-killing as they did last year because their chances of success in the Premier League are limited after a poor start to the season, manager Guus Hiddink said on Friday....

headline.main: Chelsea Must Avoid Another FA Cup Stumble, Says Hiddink
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Must Avoid Another FA Cup Stumble, Says Hiddink

lead_paragraph: Chelsea must not fall victim to another FA Cup giant-killing as they did last year because their chances of success in the Premier League are limited after a poor start to the season, manager Guus Hiddink said on Friday.

snippet: Leicester City enjoyed the easiest possible introduction to Champions League soccer as two Riyad Mahrez goals helped them to brush off the limited Group G challenge of Club Bruges 3-0 at the Jan Breydel stadium on Wednesday....

headline.main: Two-Goal Mahrez Gives Leicester Flying Start at Bruges
headline.print_headline: Two-Goal Mahrez Gives Leicester Flying Start at Bruges

lead_paragraph: Leicester City enjoyed the easiest possible introduction to Champions League soccer as two Riyad Mahrez goals helped them to brush off the limited Group G challenge of Club Bruges 3-0 at the Jan Breydel stadium on Wednesday.

snippet: Ambitious Arsenal Tula are one step closer a Champions League tussle with their more illustrious London namesakes after promotion to the Russian Premier League this week....

headline.main: Russia's Gunners Set Their Sights on Arsenal
headline.print_headline: Russia's Gunners Set Their Sights on Arsenal

lead_paragraph: Ambitious Arsenal Tula are one step closer a Champions League tussle with their more illustrious London namesakes after promotion to the Russian Premier League this week.

snippet: Tim Howard had his fourth shutout in eight games and the Colorado Rapids tied Orlando City 0-0 on Saturday night....

headline.main: Howard Records 4th Shutout, Rapids Tie Orlando City 0-0
headline.print_headline: Howard Records 4th Shutout, Rapids Tie Orlando City 0-0

lead_paragraph: Tim Howard had his fourth shutout in eight games and the Colorado Rapids tied Orlando City 0-0 on Saturday night.

snippet: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin will return to the dugout for Saturday's Premier League trip to Bournemouth after recovering from a chest infection that caused him to miss two matches....

headline.main: Swansea City Manager Guidolin Released From Hospital
headline.print_headline: Swansea City Manager Guidolin Released From Hospital

lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Francesco Guidolin will return to the dugout for Saturday's Premier League trip to Bournemouth after recovering from a chest infection that caused him to miss two matches.
